players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso, stay cautious. Alice, use your detective skills wisely."
You: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Villagers, be vigilant and work together."
Bob: "Thanks Alice, we'll stay alert. Charlie, any tips?"
Charlie: "Trust no one fully. Alice, use your detective skills."
You: "Charlie, you're mafioso. Villagers, stay united and watchful."
Bob: "Alice, investigate Charlie. Villagers, stay united."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
